channel.title: Disguising your computer windows vista!
channel.description:
WARNING: I am not responsible for any damages caused by modifying system files in order to make your computer look really similar to vista. Problems with icons may occur with uninstalling Vista Tranformation!
Please read the FAQ's before starting to install the files: [url=http://www.jcxp.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=14801]Vista Transformation FAQ[/url] (it helps to know of people's problems with the program so you know what to expect)
1)Download windows blinds here: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/19246069/Stardock_WindowBlinds_4.6_Enhanced.zip.html]RapidShare Download[/url] EDIT:I just found out the dl link to the file is currently BROKEN so if someone would please add me on msn I would certainly send the file to you. Perhaps someone could maybe re-upload it as I do not wish to stand the risk of them tracking me down though ip.
2)Download TopDesk originally posted at S!m's thread: [url=http://uppit.com/Q2Z8T]UppIt Download[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/19270615/xp_vista_flipping.zip]RapidShare Mirror[/url]
3)Download the windowblinds theme file from: [url=http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/36552053/?qo=9&q=by%3Akayeirene&qh=sort%3Atime+-in%3Ascraps]Windowblinds theme[/url]
4)Download Vista Transformation Pack at: [url=http://www.softpedia.com/get/System/OS-Enhancements/Vista-Transformation-Pack.shtml]Vista Transformation Pack at Softpedia[/url]
5)start up Vista Transformation Pack in SAFE MODE with NO programs running! (press F8 when booting up computer) Be sure the read the installation instructions VERY CAREFULLY to avoid messing up.
6)Select the components you want to install. (I recommend the vista sounds, cursor, login screen, boot screen, LClock, and desktop sidebar although the sidebar is kind of like a CPU monster.)
7)Reboot your computer and select VistaPerfection X2 as your theme and enjoy!
Here is a picture of how your desktop should look like if everything goes right: [img]http://www.imagemule.com/uploads/vistaZJJ7.png[/img]
KNOWN GLITCHES: 1)do no put glassy windows below the start menu as the window frames would appear on top of the menu. 2)sometimes there are "ghostly" windows that appear to be open but are no even though a ghostly image still appears to be on the task bar. 3)top part of orb sometimes flashes when opening the start menu.
Thanks Skating On Java for the updated links! =) Updated: Mar 5, 2007

item.title: Disguising your computer windows vista!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“xxhellfirexx, post:17, topic:61471”]It still is not legal as even though the vista skin had to be redone for windowblinds, the images are still the property of windows. Just like you have a png image and someone else took your image and saved it as a jpeg file and claimed it as his. Is the image yours or his?
Also if you did not purchase windowblinds or topdesk, that is not legal.
End of discussion.[/quote]

Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Disguising your computer windows vista!
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

[quote=“gikid, post:3, topic:64573”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=88601.msg976757#msg976757 date=1173154093]

I have another way for the people who like to do it “legally”.

Why do you think that is legal? You realize that you did not pay for the Vista skin, and that skin is intellectual property of M$.
[/quote]

Are you retarded? This is a complete remake of the vista skin. That is 100 percent legal.[/quote]

It still is not legal as even though the vista skin had to be redone for windowblinds, the images are still the property of windows. Just like you have a png image and someone else took your image and saved it as a jpeg file and claimed it as his. Is the image yours or his?
Also if you did not purchase windowblinds or topdesk, that is not legal.
End of discussion.

Read full topic

pass:

www.sharebay.org[br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2007, 09:32:20 AM[/size][hr]I have a terrible computer, I am getting a new one soon with vista, so i thought i would try it out, and it’s fine no errors, just quite a few glitch’s also i only have 512MB ram but it still was fast.

item.title: Disguising your computer windows vista!
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

thug life2:

Yeah, Nice but why not just get real vista

Why not? Vista doesn’t have anything consider as “good” right now. The theme looks great so people rip it. Some programs are not compatible with vista yet so why not wait a few years until the vista price goes down while you enjoy the theme? After all new releases got tons of glitches and security vulnerabilities so just wait.

Read full topic

item.title: Disguising your computer windows vista!

im doing it, long download, i need windows blinds, anyone have?
[/quote]

Please don’t do this unless you have 2 gig ram. It’s stupid and pointless.[/quote]

Ok i won’t then. I got the Vista theme though. I will not do the rest untill i get my new computer (then i will have real vista on)

Read full topic

86 views and almost no replies?!? Geez too many leechers out here. I mean please make comments if you actually made use of this tutorial. Don’t just browse through and download all the links as it actually took time for me to find those links sitting at the bottom of 30+ threads.

item.title: Disguising your computer windows vista!
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

this is nice but can you put like spaces between your steps it gets confusing/difficult to read.

WARNING: I am not responsible for any damages caused by modifying system files in order to make your computer look really similar to vista. Problems with icons may occur with uninstalling Vista Tranformation!
Please read the FAQ’s before starting to install the files:
http://www.jcxp.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=14801
(it helps to know of people’s problems with the program so you know what to expect)

1)Download windows blinds which I believe was posted on the forums at one time however I don’t seem to be able to find it. (kind of under 20+ pages of threads)

2)Download TopDesk posted at S!m’s thread:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

3)Download the windowblinds theme file from:

DeviantArt

VistaPerfection X2 +Standard

this theme has been updated with X4 Version: VistaPerfection X4 RCX for WindowBlinds: VistaPerfection X4 Msstyle for StyleXP and Patched Uxtheme.dll: MY SITE: enjoy

4)Download Vista Transformation Pack at:

softpedia – 3 Jan 17

Download Windows 10 Transformation Pack 7.0

Download Windows 10 Transformation Pack - Bring to your desktop the look and feel of Windows 10 operating system with the aid of a collection of selected applications whether you are using Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8/8.1

5)start up Vista Transformation Pack in SAFE MODE with NO programs running! (press F8 when booting up computer) Be sure the read the installation instructions VERY CAREFULLY to avoid messing up.

6)Select the components you want to install. (I recommend the vista sounds, cursor, login screen, boot screen, LClock, and desktop sidebar although the sidebar is kind of like a CPU monster.)

7)Reboot your computer and select VistaPerfection X2 as your theme and enjoy!

Read full topic
